New Records: CJ McCollum tied a career-high with 50 points in just 30 minutes of play, tying an NBA record for 50 or more points and 10+ three-pointers in less than 35 minutes.
Key Match Events: CJ McCollum scored a three-pointer late in the fourth quarter, but officials replayed and only awarded him a two, leaving him a point shy of setting the record.
Post-Match Reflections: CJ McCollum reflected on his career night and stated, 'It's great to score 50 and hit three-pointers, but I work so hard and sacrifice so much time. I go to the gym at night... I miss alot of time from my family putting time into the game. When you have success, you feel it's not all for not.'
